availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John E. Murrah (merchant and Assistant Quartermaster of Kentucky)

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky, merchant, soldier and assistant quartermaster of Kentucky. Merchant in Russell County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from December 23, 1863, to January 10, 1865. Captain and assistant quartermaster of Kentucky in Lebanon, Kentucky, in September 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Russell County, Russell, p. 707.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 364.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 938.
KYR-0001-005-0132.
